DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , open-label study assess effect multiple dose danoprevir/ritonavir steady-state pharmacokinetics methadone . Subjects stable methadone maintenance therapy ( 20 - 120 mg daily single oral morning dose ) receive danoprevir 100 mg orally twice daily ritonavir 100 mg orally twice daily 10 day .
